calm_relaxed.intro_message: You seem to be in a relaxed mood. Here are some peaceful travel ideas across Kerala to help you unwind. Choose a category below to find a spot that suits your vibe.

options.name: Kumarakom
options.description: Peaceful backwaters, famous for birdwatching and houseboat cruises.

options.name: Alleppey
options.description: Known for its backwater canals and houseboat experiences; ideal for tranquil boat rides.

options.name: Vazhachal
options.description: Serene waterfalls surrounded by dense greenery, perfect for unwinding.

options.name: Pathiramanal Island
options.description: Accessible by boat from Alleppey; a small, lush island sanctuary known for its quiet atmosphere.

options.name: Marari Beach
options.description: A quiet beach with minimal crowds, ideal for relaxation.

options.name: Varkala Beach
options.description: Known for its stunning cliffs and calm beach vibes, popular for yoga and meditation.

options.name: Bekal Beach
options.description: Near Bekal Fort, this beach is scenic and perfect for a slow-paced day.

options.name: Kappad Beach
options.description: Known for being where Vasco da Gama landed; it has a calm atmosphere.

options.name: Munnar
options.description: Rolling tea plantations, tranquil viewpoints, and calm settings perfect for long walks.

options.name: Wayanad
options.description: Dense forests, peaceful waterfalls, and serene viewpoints.

options.name: Nelliampathy
options.description: Known as 'Poor Man's Ooty,' offers beautiful landscapes and a peaceful vibe.

options.name: Vagamon
options.description: Known for its misty hills, pine forests, and easygoing trekking routes.

options.name: Thattekad Bird Sanctuary
options.description: Ideal for bird enthusiasts, with a wide variety of species to observe.

options.name: Silent Valley National Park
options.description: Offers a quiet and untouched forest atmosphere, ideal for peaceful nature watching.

options.name: Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary
options.description: Known for its serene lake where you can take a calm boat ride and observe elephants, birds, and other wildlife.

options.name: Kumarakom Bird Sanctuary
options.description: On the Vembanad Lake; home to migratory birds and perfect for a relaxing bird-watching experience.

options.name: Padmanabhaswamy Temple
options.description: Known for its peaceful environment and rich history.

options.name: Guruvayur Temple
options.description: Serene atmosphere with cultural significance.

options.name: Fort Kochi
options.description: A mix of historic sites, colonial architecture, and peaceful streets ideal for relaxed exploration.

options.name: Paradesi Synagogue
options.description: A quiet and beautiful site for historical reflection.

excited_adventurous.intro_message: You're in an adventurous mood! Here are some thrilling travel spots in Kerala to get your adrenaline pumping. Choose a category below to find your next adventure!

options.name: Chembra Peak
options.description: Known for a heart-shaped lake, it's a beautiful spot with trekking trails.

options.name: Meesapulimala
options.description: The second-highest peak in the Western Ghats, known for thrilling trails.

options.name: Agasthyakoodam
options.description: Popular for its biodiversity; requires a permit but offers a challenging trek.

options.name: Parunthumpara
options.description: Known as 'Eagle Rock,' with scenic cliff views and easy treks.

options.name: Athirappilly Falls
options.description: Often called the 'Niagara of India,' known for breathtaking views.

options.name: Soochipara Falls
options.description: Offers trekking paths and a beautiful fall to explore.

options.name: Thommankuthu Falls
options.description: A seven-step waterfall near Thodupuzha, ideal for adventure-seekers.

options.name: Meenmutty Falls
options.description: Known for its beautiful hike and stunning views.

options.name: Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary
options.description: Known for its jungle treks and wildlife boat rides.

options.name: Parambikulam Tiger Reserve
options.description: Great for those looking to experience Kerala's dense forests and wildlife.

options.name: Chinnar Wildlife Sanctuary
options.description: Known for its diverse flora and fauna, including elephants and the endangered Grizzled Giant Squirrel.

options.name: Wayanad Wildlife Sanctuary
options.description: Spot a variety of animals in this lush sanctuary, offering both tranquility and adventure.

options.name: Vagamon Paragliding
options.description: Experience the thrill of flying with breathtaking views of Vagamon's hills.

options.name: Scuba Diving in Kovalam
options.description: Explore underwater marine life with scuba diving adventures.

options.name: Kayaking in Alleppey
options.description: Paddle through serene backwaters and enjoy the thrill of kayaking.

options.name: Rock Climbing in Thenmala
options.description: Challenge yourself with thrilling rock-climbing experiences.

happy.intro_message: You seem to be in high spirits! Here are some cheerful travel suggestions across Kerala that align with your joyful  mood. Select a category below to explore!

options.name: Kathakali Performances in Kochi
options.description: Witness the vibrant and traditional dance-drama of Kerala.

options.name: Snake Boat Races in Alappuzha
options.description: Experience the energy of traditional boat races during Onam season.

options.name: Thrissur Pooram Festival
options.description: Join one of Kerala's grandest festivals with vibrant colors and processions.

options.name: Kalari Martial Arts in Thekkady
options.description: Enjoy an exciting display of Kerala's traditional martial arts.

options.name: Wonderla Amusement Park
options.description: A fun-filled destination for families with rides and water attractions.

options.name: Kochi's Marine Drive
options.description: Perfect for a relaxed evening stroll with scenic waterfront views.

options.name: Kerala Science and Technology Museum
options.description: A great educational experience for kids and families.

options.name: Napier Museum
options.description: Explore Kerala's art and history in this family-friendly museum.

options.name: Kovalam Beach
options.description: Known for its golden sand, vibrant sunsets, and relaxed vibe.

options.name: Varkala Cliff Beach
options.description: A unique cliff-side beach with shops and cafes overlooking the sea.

options.name: Bekal Beach
options.description: Famous for the Bekal Fort and its tranquil environment.

options.name: Marari Beach
options.description: A pristine beach perfect for unwinding and soaking up the sun.

options.name: Jew Town in Kochi
options.description: Discover antiques, spices, and unique souvenirs in a historic setting.

options.name: Broadway Market in Ernakulam
options.description: A bustling market with a mix of traditional and modern shopping options.

options.name: Lulu Mall in Kochi
options.description: One of India's largest malls with shopping, dining, and entertainment.

options.name: Trivandrum Chalai Bazaar
options.description: Explore this vibrant market for spices, textiles, and fresh produce.

options.name: Onam Celebrations
options.description: Experience the spirit of Kerala's harvest festival with floral carpets and feasts.

options.name: Vishu Festival
options.description: Enjoy the traditional New Year festival marked by lights and traditional meals.

options.name: Theyyam Performances in Kannur
options.description: A vibrant ritualistic art form celebrated in temples.

options.name: Nehru Trophy Boat Race
options.description: A thrilling boat race event held on the Punnamada Lake in Alappuzha.

sad.intro_message: Feeling a little low? How about visiting some calming and uplifting spots in Kerala to lift your spirits? Choose a  category that resonates with you.

options.name: Silent Valley National Park
options.description: Find solace in pristine nature with quiet and untouched forests.

options.name: Vagamon Meadows
options.description: Feel rejuvenated amidst the serene greenery of Vagamon.

options.name: Poovar Island
options.description: Relax with golden beaches and peaceful backwaters.

options.name: Munroe Island
options.description: Perfect for a quiet escape with scenic canal rides.

options.name: Marari Beach
options.description: Relaxed vibe with few crowds, perfect for calm reflection.

options.name: Payyambalam Beach
options.description: A peaceful, less-crowded beach, ideal for introspection.

options.name: Bekal Beach
options.description: Known for its fort, scenic views, and serene atmosphere.

options.name: Kappad Beach
options.description: A historically significant and tranquil beach near Kozhikode.

options.name: Padmanabhaswamy Temple
options.description: Known for its peaceful ambiance and spiritual significance.

options.name: Guruvayur Temple
options.description: A serene temple offering calm and cultural richness.

options.name: St. Francis Church
options.description: A historic church offering a reflective and tranquil space.

options.name: Paradesi Synagogue
options.description: A historic site with a calm and quiet ambiance.

options.name: Alleppey Backwaters
options.description: Enjoy relaxing houseboat rides through tranquil backwaters.

options.name: Vembanad Lake
options.description: India’s longest lake, perfect for peaceful boat rides.

options.name: Ashtamudi Lake
options.description: A serene lake known for its picturesque backwaters.

options.name: Punnamada Lake
options.description: Ideal for quiet and scenic moments, also the site of the Nehru Trophy Boat Race.

options.name: Munnar
options.description: Rolling tea gardens and serene landscapes, perfect for a peaceful escape.

options.name: Ponmudi
options.description: A small hill station with scenic views and quiet hiking trails.

options.name: Wayanad
options.description: Known for its forest trails, waterfalls, and serene viewpoints.

options.name: Peerumedu
options.description: A quaint hill station known for its peaceful tea plantations.

neutral.intro_message: Looking for something interesting to do? Here are some balanced travel ideas across Kerala for you to enjoy a change of pace.

options.name: kozhikode beach
options.description: A Popular destination for relaxation and sunset views.The beach has a historical significance with its association with the spice trade.
options.Attraction: lighthouse, Swimming, Beach activities, Street food

options.name: Mananchira Square
options.description: A historic square in the heart of kozhikode city, with a large pond and surounding gardens.It is perfect for a peaceful walk or a picnic.
options.Attraction: Garden, lake, walking paths, musical foundain

options.name: Kappad Beach
options.description: The beach wher Vasco Da Gama landed in 1498, making the begining of the spice trade in kerala.jIt is less crowded and perfect for a relaxing day by th sea.

options.name: Thusharagiri Waterfalls
options.description: A beautiful waterfall located around 50km from kozhikode, offering scenic beauty and trekking opportunities.It's a popular spot for nature lovers and adventure seekers.

options.name: Thrissur
options.description: Known as Kerala's cultural capital, with temples and festivals.

options.name: Paradesi Synagogue (Kochi)
options.description: Historic Jewish synagogue in Jew Town.

options.name: Bekal Fort
options.description: Kerala's largest fort, set against the coast.

options.name: Mattancherry Palace (Kochi)
options.description: An old palace with beautiful murals and history.

options.name: Eravikulam National Park (Munnar)
options.description: Known for the endangered Nilgiri Tahr and beautiful landscapes.

options.name: Neyyar Dam (Thiruvananthapuram)
options.description: A scenic spot for picnics and nature walks.

options.name: Malampuzha Gardens (Palakkad)
options.description: Known for its gardens, boating, and cable car.

options.name: Chembra Peak (Wayanad)
options.description: Famous for its heart-shaped lake and beautiful views.

options.name: Cherai Beach (Kochi)
options.description: A blend of backwaters and beach, great for relaxation.

options.name: Kappil Beach (Kasargod)
options.description: A scenic, lesser-known beach with beautiful views.

options.name: Kovalam Beach
options.description: Popular for its crescent-shaped beaches and vibrant setting.

options.name: Alleppey Beach
options.description: Known for its serene sands and nearby lighthouse.
